participant_1.background: i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i drive a mini van. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.background: i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i am 40 years old. i am planning on getting a divorce. i work as a car salesman.

content.text: I'm good thanks, how are you?
